index.hero_text: Welcome to your oasis of peace on the enchanting island of Lampedusa. Immerse yourself in unspoiled beauty, among golden beaches and crystal-clear waters. Our facility offers an unforgettable stay, combining modern comfort and authentic Mediterranean charm. Explore the natural wonders, savor the local cuisine, and relax in a serene environment.
index.apartment_pulcino_desc: The Cala Pulcino Apartment is a bright and spacious retreat, ideal for couples or small families. It features a double bedroom (+ single bed), a cozy living room/kitchen with a sofa bed, a fully equipped kitchen, and a modern bathroom.
index.apartment_creta_desc: The Cala Creta Apartment offers an intimate and relaxing atmosphere, perfect for those seeking tranquility. It includes a double bedroom, a living room/kitchen with a sofa bed, a fully equipped kitchen, a modern and elegant bathroom, and a balcony.

apartments_page.subtitle: Discover our cozy apartments, designed to offer you maximum comfort and relaxation during your stay in Lampedusa.
apartments_page.cta_subtitle: Contact us to check availability and receive a personalized quote for your dream vacation.

beaches_page.title: The Beaches and Coves of Lampedusa
beaches_page.subtitle: Lampedusa is a jewel of the Mediterranean, famous for its breathtaking beaches and crystal-clear waters. Explore the natural wonders of the island, each with its unique charm.
beaches_page.beach_conigli_desc: Considered one of the most beautiful beaches in the world, Spiaggia dei Conigli is a natural paradise with fine white sand and turquoise waters. It is also an important nesting site for Caretta caretta sea turtles. Attention: reservation is mandatory to access the beach. You can make it through the official website: prenotazionespiaggiaconigli.it.
beaches_page.beach_conigli_access: Reachable on foot via a path of about 20 minutes from the parking lot, or by sea.
beaches_page.beach_conigli_distance: About 7 km from Via Ariosto 49 (15-20 minutes by car + walk).
beaches_page.beach_pulcino_desc: Reachable via a panoramic (more challenging) path or by sea, Cala Pulcino enchants with its clear waters and wild nature. An ideal place for snorkeling and enjoying peace and tranquility.
beaches_page.beach_pulcino_access: Accessible via a walking path of about 40 minutes or by sea with boats.
beaches_page.beach_pulcino_distance: About 8 km from Via Ariosto 49 (20 minutes by car + walk).
beaches_page.beach_croce_desc: One of the most accessible and popular beaches, with fine sand and shallow water, perfect for families with children. It offers beach services and restaurants.
beaches_page.beach_croce_access: Easily reachable by car or scooter, with parking available.
beaches_page.beach_croce_distance: About 2 km from Via Ariosto 49 (5 minutes by car).
beaches_page.beach_guitgia_desc: Located near the town center, it is a golden sand beach with calm, crystal-clear waters. Very convenient and well-equipped.
beaches_page.beach_guitgia_access: Reachable on foot from the center of Lampedusa or a few minutes by car.
beaches_page.beach_guitgia_distance: About 1 km from Via Ariosto 49 (2 minutes by car or 10 minutes on foot).
beaches_page.beach_madonna_desc: A small and enchanting sandy cove, ideal for those seeking a corner of tranquility. Its waters are transparent and inviting.
beaches_page.beach_madonna_access: Accessible by car or scooter, with a short walk.
beaches_page.beach_madonna_distance: About 2.5 km from Via Ariosto 49 (6 minutes by car).
beaches_page.beach_greca_desc: A rocky cove with deep, crystal-clear waters, perfect for snorkeling and diving enthusiasts. It offers a wilder and unspoiled landscape.
beaches_page.beach_greca_access: Reachable by car or scooter, with a short rocky path to descend.
beaches_page.beach_greca_distance: About 3 km from Via Ariosto 49 (7 minutes by car).
beaches_page.beach_creta_desc: Characterized by cliffs and rocky seabed, Cala Creta is a suggestive place for swimming and snorkeling. Its waters are an intense blue.
beaches_page.beach_creta_access: Easily reachable by car or scooter, with direct access to the sea from some platforms.
beaches_page.beach_creta_distance: About 4 km from Via Ariosto 49 (10 minutes by car).
beaches_page.beach_pisana_desc: A small bay with a tourist harbor, ideal for a refreshing swim and admiring the boats. It also offers a small bar.
beaches_page.beach_pisana_access: Reachable by car or scooter, with parking nearby.
beaches_page.beach_pisana_distance: About 3.5 km from Via Ariosto 49 (8 minutes by car).
